attributes.additional_details: I would like to ban the bang in fireworks. For people with pets this is very traumatic and we are a pet loving nation. Then think of all the wildlife that will be traumatised. Then children with autism and then veterans.we are supposed to be a caring nation but looking at all the rejected petitions i wonder.
attributes.background: This is simple still have fireworks but remove the bang that causes so much pain in our pets, wildlife, veterans and autistic children

rejection.details:
All fireworks make some noise, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900

Ban all fireworks permanently, including displays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850
